name: Ms. Alexander
summary: Public relations, communications and events executive with 15+ years of experience in PR, business development and operations. Strong strategic thinking, planning and interpersonal management; proven track record in managing campaigns, media relations, celebrity events and crisis PR; proficient with databases and software including Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook and Cision.

experience.title: Public Relations Executive
experience.description: Sign new business, write PR proposals, broker talent deals, maintain client relationships, supervise music & red carpet events, provide crisis PR and manage staff. Develop and execute creative press campaigns and special events for recording artists, athletes, TV/film personalities and entertainment companies; manage VIP/celebrity event management; delegate tasks to associate publicists, managers, coordinators and executive assistants; create targeted marketing plans; pitch clients for media coverage; build relationships with major media outlets; prepare budget estimates; monitor social media trends; prepare bi-monthly status reports; develop campaigns for events and award shows; secure national and international media coverage.

experience.title: Senior Director
experience.description: Create and implement press campaigns for high-profile artists; manage national campaigns; coordinate music press for films; develop online, print and on-air media strategies aligned with corporate & artist objectives; structure long-term PR plans; supervise national and local television coverage and trade publications; set up artist releases (EPKs, press kits); oversee press materials; coordinate photo shoots with talent and budgets; manage red carpet coverage and event activities.

experience.title: Senior Account Executive
experience.description: Design and implement PR projects, special events and publicity campaigns for recording artists, producers, labels and entertainment companies; implemented PR strategies that grew client business and increased department billings; lead strategy sessions; supervise account teams; ensure quality control of press releases and media alerts; manage event publicity and media contact lists; coordinate media for major awards shows and celebrity initiatives; work with talent reps and managers on campaigns.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Business Management
Associate of Arts in Law / Legal Studies / Paralegal (Entertainment)
Associate of Arts in Law / Legal Studies
